entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a wizard who is on a mission with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, also a wizard.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Ron's pet dog that is accompanying them on their mission.

entities.name: spiders
entities.description: The creatures they are following in the forest to find signs of danger.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are walking together in the forest, with Fang by their side.
Harry is accompanied by Ron's dog, Fang.
Harry is following the spiders in the forest to find signs of danger.
Ron is also following the spiders with Harry.
